item.title: Israeli Military Begins West Bank Raids
item.description: Amid rising tensions, Israeli troops embarked on what Israel described as a counterterrorism operation. That came hours after Jewish extremists attack...

item.title: The Last Migrant Caravans Before Trump’s Inauguration
item.description: A Times photographer made two trips to southern Mexico to follow groups of migrants as they walked toward the United States.

item.title: Southport Killer Had ‘Sickening and Sustained Interest’ in Violence, U.K. Officials Say
item.description: Axel Rudakubana, who killed three young girls in the Southport attack, appeared to have no particular ideology but was obsessed by death and genocide,...

item.title: At Least 10 Are Killed at Ski Resort Fire in Turkey
item.description: The fire at the Grand Kartal Hotel, in a ski resort in Bolu Province, started when most of the guests were asleep. The cause of the fire was unclear.

item.title: Fire at Turkey Ski Resort Kills at Least 10
item.description: The blaze broke out overnight at a popular ski resort during a school break when many families head to the slopes.
